content: व्यतीपातः {@--1@} Total departure, complete deviation. {@--2@} Any great portentous calamity, or a portent foreboding a great calamity. {@--3@} Disrespect, contempt. {@--4@} The seventeenth of the astronomical Yogas. {@--5@} The day of full-moon (when it falls on a Monday). {@--6@} A malignant or evil aspect of the sun and moon (considered to be inauspicious for the performance of any action).
